paper_abstract: We present a new bound for the minimum distance of a general primary linear code. For affine variety codes defined from generalised polynomials the new bound often improves dramatically on the Feng-Rao bound for primary codes (Andersen and Geil, Finite Fields Appl 14(1):92-123, 2008; Geil et al., Lecture Notes in Computer Science 3857: 295-306, 2006). The method does not only work for the minimum distance but can be applied to any generalised Hamming weight.
paper_title: An improvement of the Feng-Rao bound for primary codes
